articles.description: Jr NTR With His Wife, Kalyanram And Venkatesh Daggubati, Have Reached Film Chamber To Pay Their Respects To Taraka Ratna
articles.content: The grandson of late actor and Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister N T Rama Rao, Taraka Ratna's funeral will take place today, February 20. Taraka Ratna, 39, passed away on Saturday night, February 18 afte… [+1129 chars]

articles.author: IndiaGlitz
articles.title: Launch of Jr NTR's 30th movie called off - Telugu News - Telugu Cinema - IndiaGlitz
articles.description: Jr NTR's 30th movie will start its shoot on or before March 20. The film's launch date was supposed to be February 24.
